00034 AppSettings::AppSettings( ): m_vme_link(0), m_vme_board_num(0), m_vme_base_address(0x32100000), m_vme_clkin_freq(50.00), m_mutex( wxMUTEX_RECURSIVE)
00035 {
00036         this->m_root_dir= wxGetCwd()+ wxFileName::GetPathSeparator();
00037         wxString setting_filename= this->m_root_dir+ _("settings.txt");
00038         if( wxTheApp->argc>= 2)
00039                 setting_filename= this->m_root_dir+ wxTheApp->argv[ 1];
00040 
00041         wxConfigBase::Set( new wxFileConfig( wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString, setting_filename, setting_filename, wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE ));
00042 }

00044 AppSettings::~AppSettings(void)
00045 {
00046         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++) {
00047                 delete (GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i];
00048         }
00049         delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
00050 }
00054 bool AppSettings::Load( void)
00055 {
00056         /*
00057         Application setting file structure
00058         [MISC]
00059         |
00060         |- VME_BOARD_TYPE=V1718
00061         |- VME_LINK=0
00062         |- VME_BOARD_NUM=0
00063         |- TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FOLDER= "./templates/"
00064         |- 
00065         |- ACQ_BOARD_NUM= 4
00066         [ACQ_BOARDS]
00067         |
00068         |- [0]
00069         |   |
00070         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00071         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00072         |   ...
00073         |- [1]
00074         |   |
00075         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1720
00076         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00077         |- [2]
00078         |   |
00079         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1721
00080         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00081         |- [3]
00082         |   |
00083         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1731
00084         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00085         |- [4]
00086         |   |
00087         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1731_DES
00088         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00089         |- [5]
00090         |   |
00091         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1740
00092         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00093         */
00094 
00095         unsigned int i;
00096         // Delete previously stored boards
00097         this->m_board_array.Clear();
00098         wxConfigBase* config= wxConfigBase::Get( false);
00099         if( !config)
00100         {
00101                 wxLogError( _("Cannot get configuration file\n"));
00102                 return false;
00103         }
00104 
00105         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_mutex);
00106         
00107         //
00108         // Get Record Folder
00109         config->Read(  _("/MISC/TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FOLDER"), &this->m_template_config_folder, "./templates/");
00110         // Sanity checks
00111         if( !wxDir::Exists( this->m_template_config_folder))
00112         {
00113                 // Set to current directory
00114                 this->m_template_config_folder= "./";
00115         }
00116 
00117         //
00118         // Get VME board type
00119         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_TYPE"), &this->m_vme_board_type_string, _("V1718"));
00120         //
00121         // Get VME board link
00122         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_LINK"), &this->m_vme_link, 0);
00123 
00124     //
00125         // Get VME base adddress
00126 
00127         //
00128         // Get the board address
00129         wxString board_add_string= _("");
00130         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_BASE_ADDRESS"), &board_add_string, _("32100000"));
00131         unsigned long board_add= 0;
00132         wxString hex_part;
00133         if( board_add_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00134         {
00135                 // Hex format
00136                 if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 16))
00137                 {
00138                         board_add= 0;
00139                 }
00140         }
00141         else
00142         {
00143                 // Decimal format
00144                 if( !board_add_string.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 10))
00145                 {
00146                         board_add= 0;
00147                 }
00148         }
00149     this->m_vme_base_address = (UINT32)board_add;
00150 
00151 
00152         // Get PLL CLKIN Frequency (MHz)
00153     config->Read( _("/MISC/CLKIN_FREQ"), &this->m_vme_clkin_freq, 50.00);
00154 
00155     //
00156         // Get VME board number
00157         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_NUM"), &this->m_vme_board_num, 0);
00158 
00159         int acq_board_num= 0;
00160         config->Read( _("/MISC/ACQ_BOARD_NUM"), &acq_board_num, 0);
00161 
00162         wxString board_base_string= _("/ACQ_BOARDS/");
00163 
00164         //
00165         // Boards loop
00166         for( i= 0; i< (unsigned int)acq_board_num; i++)
00167         {
00168                 GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)0;
00169                 wxString board_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", board_base_string.c_str(), i);
00170 
00171                 //
00172                 // Get the board type
00173                 wxString board_type= _("");
00174                 config->Read( board_string+ _("BOARD_TYPE"), &board_type, _("V1724"));
00175                 // A board was specified : create a board of proper type
00176                 if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1724")))
00177                 {
00178                         // V1724
00179                         board= new V1724Board( this);
00180                 }
00181                 else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1721")))
00182                 {
00183                         // V1721
00184                         board= new V1721Board( this);
00185                 }
00186                 else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1720")))
00187                 {
00188                         // V1720
00189                         board= new V1720Board( this);
00190                 }
00191                 else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1731")))
00192                 {
00193                         // V1731 Not DES mode
00194                         board= new V1731Board( this, false);
00195                 }
00196                 else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1731_DES")))
00197                 { 
00198                         // V1731 DES mode 
00199                         board= new V1731Board( this, true);
00200                 }
00201                 else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1740")))
00202                 {
00203                         // V1740
00204                         board= new V1740Board( this);
00205                 }
00206                 else
00207                 {
00208                         // Unknown board type
00209                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Unknown board type '%s'\n", board_type.c_str()));
00210                         // return false;
00211                 }
00212                 if( !board)
00213                 {
00214                         continue;
00215                 }
00216                 this->m_board_array.Add( board);
00217                 this->m_board_type_strings.Add( board_type);
00218 
00219                 // Load board section
00220                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->LoadConfig( config, board_string))
00221                 {
00222                         wxLogError( _("Error loading board settings\n"));
00223                         // return false;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         return true;
00227 }
00228 
00232 bool AppSettings::Save( void)
00233 {
00234 
00235         /*
00236         Application setting file structure
00237         [MISC]
00238         |
00239         |- VME_BOARD_TYPE=V1718
00240         |- VME_LINK=0
00241         |- VME_BOARD_NUM=0
00242         |- TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FOLDER= "./templates/"
00243         |- 
00244         |- ACQ_BOARD_NUM= 4
00245         [ACQ_BOARDS]
00246         |
00247         |- [0]
00248         |   |
00249         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00250         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00251         |   ...
00252         |- [1]
00253         |   |
00254         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1720
00255         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00256         |- [2]
00257         |   |
00258         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1721
00259         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00260         |- [3]
00261         |   |
00262         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1731
00263         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00264         |- [4]
00265         |   |
00266         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1731_DES
00267         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00268         |- [5]
00269         |   |
00270         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1740
00271         |   |- ( Other board data here )
00272         */
00273 
00274         wxConfigBase* config= wxConfigBase::Get( false);
00275         if( !config)
00276                 return false;
00277         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_mutex);
00278 
00279         //
00280         // Delete groups
00281         wxString group_id;
00282         long group_index;
00283         while( config->GetFirstGroup( group_id, group_index))
00284         {
00285                 config->DeleteGroup( group_id);
00286         }
00287         //
00288         // Set Record Folder
00289         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FOLDER"), this->m_template_config_folder))
00290                 return false;
00291 
00292         //
00293         // Set VME board type
00294         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_TYPE"), this->m_vme_board_type_string))
00295                 return false;
00296         //
00297         // Set VME board link
00298         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_LINK"), this->m_vme_link))
00299                 return false;
00300 
00301     //
00302         // Set VME base address
00303     wxString board_add_string= wxString::Format( "0x%08x", this->m_vme_base_address);
00304         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_BASE_ADDRESS"), board_add_string))
00305                 return false;
00306 
00307         //
00308         // Set PLL CLKIN Frequency
00309     if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/CLKIN_FREQ"), this->m_vme_clkin_freq))
00310                 return false;
00311 
00312     //
00313         // Set VME board number
00314         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_NUM"), this->m_vme_board_num))
00315                 return false;
00316 
00317         //
00318         // Set board number
00319         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/ACQ_BOARD_NUM"), (int)this->m_board_array.GetCount()))
00320                 return false;
00321 
00322         wxString board_base_string= _("/ACQ_BOARDS/");
00323         //
00324         // Boards loop
00325         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
00326         {
00327                 wxString board_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", board_base_string.c_str(), i);
00328                 //
00329                 // Set the board type
00330                 if( !config->Write( board_string+ _("BOARD_TYPE"), this->m_board_type_strings[ i]))
00331                         return false;
00332 
00333                 // Save board section
00334                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->SaveConfig( config, board_string))
00335                         return false;
00336         }
00337         if( !config->Flush())
00338                 return false;
00339 
00340         return true;
00341 }
